title: JournalApp
description: A Spring Boot-based application that allows users to create, retrieve, update, and delete journal entries with built-in JWT authentication for enhanced security and data privacy.

body.raw:
This repository contains JournalApp, a Spring Boot application designed for users to manage their personal journals. The app supports CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for journals, with secure user authentication provided through JWT (JSON Web Tokens). ## Features 1. **User Management:** Perform CRUD operations on users and their associated journals. Secure endpoints with JWT-based authentication to ensure only authorized users can access and modify their journal entries. 2. **Journal Management:** Create, read, update, and delete journal entries. Each journal entry is securely associated with the user who created it. 3. **User-Friendly Interface:** Clean and intuitive interface for seamless navigation and journal management. 4. **Security:** JWT authentication to protect user data and ensure secure access. 5. **Scalability:** Built on Spring Boot and Hibernate, capable of handling numerous users and journals. ## Prerequisites **Java Development Kit (JDK)** 11 or higher **Maven** 3.6+ **MySQL** or any other supported relational database An IDE (e.g., IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse) ## Installation Clone this repository. ```bash git clone https://github.com/tushar21014/SpringBoot-API/tree/main ``` ```bash cd JournalApp ``` ## Set up the database: Create a new database in MySQL (or your preferred RDBMS).
Update the application.properties file with your database credentials. ```bash spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/journaldb spring.datasource.username=root spring.datasource.password=yourpassword spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update ``` ## Build the project: ```bash mvn clean install ``` ## Run the application: ```bash mvn spring-boot:run ``` ## Access the application: The application will run on http://localhost:8080.
Use Postman or any other API client to test the CRUD operations and JWT authentication.
## Usage Register a new user: Send a POST request to /api/users/register with user data in the request body. Login: Send a POST request to /api/users/login with valid credentials. You will receive a JWT token upon successful login. ### Access User Data: Include the received JWT token in the Authorization header for authenticated routes to access user data. ### CRUD Operations: - Create: Send a POST request to /users/add with new journal data. - Read: Send a GET request to /users/search to fetch user journal details. - Update: Send a PUT request to /users/:journalId with updated user journal data. - Delete: Send a DELETE request to /users/:journalId to delete a journal. ## Contributing Contributions are welcome! If you find any issues or have ideas for improvements, feel free to open a pull request :)

title: TaskSwift
description: TaskSwift is a MERN stack web app that simplifies internship management. It enables smooth collaboration, secure task handling, and progress tracking among Superusers, Mentors, Directors, and Interns. With a user-friendly interface and powerful analytics, TaskSwift enhances program efficiency and outcomes.

body.raw:
Welcome to TaskSwift, your ultimate solution for managing and optimizing internship programs within organizations. Whether you're an administrator, mentor, or intern, TaskSwift offers an intuitive platform designed to streamline task management, communication, and progress tracking, ensuring a productive and collaborative experience for everyone involved. ## Features - **Task Creation**: Teachers can easily create tasks with detailed instructions, due dates, and resources. - **Task Distribution**: Efficiently assign tasks to individuals, groups, or entire classes with a few clicks. - **Progress Tracking**: Monitor student progress in real-time, track submissions, and identify students needing support. - **Seamless Communication**: Facilitate direct communication between teachers and students for feedback, questions, and announcements. - **User-Friendly Interface**: Navigate TaskSwift effortlessly with a clean and intuitive design tailored for all users, from Superusers to Interns. - **Customizable Profiles**: Create and manage multiple user profiles, each with personalized settings, roles, and access levels within the organization. ## Screenshots Here are some screenshots of the V-Anime app: ### Admin Dashboard ### Mentor Dashboard ### New Applications ### Analytics
## Getting Started 1. **Download TaskSwift**: Clone the repository from GitHub and follow the instructions to set up the application locally.
2. **Sign Up or Log In**: Create an account or log in with your credentials to start managing your internship program.
3. **Create and Assign Tasks**: Use the task creation feature to set up tasks and distribute them to the relevant interns or teams.
4. **Track Progress**: Monitor task completion and progress through the intuitive dashboard.
5. **Enhance Communication**: Keep the communication flowing between mentors and interns using the in-app messaging system.
6. **Optimize Outcomes**: Use the built-in analytics to gather insights and optimize your internship program for better results.
## Acknowledgments - This project was developed as part of the CDAC internship program. - Special thanks to the mentors, directors, and interns who provided valuable feedback and support. ## Feedback We're constantly working to improve the TaskSwift experience, and we'd love to hear your feedback. If you have any suggestions, questions, or encounter any issues while using our app, please don't hesitate to contact us at [tg21014@gmail.com](mailto:tg21014+@gmail.com). ## Privacy Policy & Terms of Service Before using V-Anime, please review our [Privacy Policy](https://www.v-anime.com/privacy) and [Terms of Service](https://www.v-anime.com/terms) to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Thank you for viewing TaskSwift. Happy Managing!
Share With your friends.

title: Zomaggy
description: Zomaggy is an innovative food delivery app designed to connect users with a variety of restaurants for quick and easy food orders. The app offers a seamless user experience, efficient order tracking, and secure payment methods.

body.raw:
Welcome to Zomaggy, your ultimate destination for discovering and ordering food from your favorite restaurants. Zomaggy provides a smooth, user-friendly interface to browse menus, place orders, and track delivery status in real time.

## Features

- **Restaurant Discovery:**
  - Easily find and explore a wide range of restaurants based on cuisine, location, and user ratings.

- **Order Management:**
  - Place orders with a few taps and customize your meals to suit your preferences.
  - Track your orders in real-time, from preparation to delivery.

- **Secure Payments:**
  - Multiple payment options, including credit/debit cards, UPI, and wallets.
  - End-to-end encryption ensures the security of your payment information.

- **User-Friendly Interface:**
  - Clean and intuitive design for effortless navigation and food ordering.
  
- **Order History:**
  - Keep track of all your past orders for easy reordering and reference.

- **Push Notifications:**
  - Stay updated with real-time alerts on order status, special offers, and promotions.

## Technologies Used

- **Backend:**
  - Node.js
  - Express.js
  - MongoDB for database management

- **Frontend:**
  - React.js
  - Redux for state management

- **Payment Integration:**
  - Stripe API

- **Security:**
  - JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for user authentication
  - Bcrypt JS
  - Firebase

## Prerequisites

- **Node.js** and **npm** installed
- **MongoDB** server running
- Basic understanding of RESTful APIs and payment gateways

## Installation

1. **Clone the repository:**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/Zomaggy.git
   cd Zomaggy

2. **Install dependencies:**

    ```bash
    npm install

3. **Create a .env file and configure your database and API keys.**
Example:
    ```bash
    MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/zomaggydb
    STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=your-stripe-secret-key
    JWT_SECRET=your-jwt-secret

4. **Start the application:**

    ``` bash
    npm run dev 
5. **Access the application:**

Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser to start exploring Zomaggy.

## API Endpoints
1. Register User: Send a POST request to /api/auth/signup url.
2. User Login: POST /api/auth/login
3. Get Restaurants: GET /api/restaurants
4. Place Order: POST /api/orders
5. Track Order: GET /api/orders/:orderId

## Contributing
Contributions are welcome! If you find any issues or have ideas for improvements, feel free to open a pull request :)

title: AWS Automated Email Scheduler
description: This project is a mailing system designed to streamline bulk email communication with HR professionals. It features personalized bulk emailing, flexible scheduling, automatic labeling, and efficient email management.

body.raw:
This project is a mailing system designed to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of bulk email communication with HR professionals. Built using React, Node.js, Express, and AWS, this application offers advanced features such as personalized bulk emailing, flexible scheduling, automatic labeling, and comprehensive email management.

## Features

- **Bulk Emailing:** Send personalized emails in bulk to HR professionals.
- **Advanced Scheduling:** Schedule emails individually for precision and convenience.
- **Automatic Labeling:** Automatically label emails by company names for easy management.
- **Customizable Formats:** Choose from various email formats to suit your needs.
- **CRUD Operations:** Create, read, update, and delete scheduled emails.
- **Immediate Dispatch:** Send emails immediately in addition to scheduling.
- **AWS Integration:** Ensures fast, reliable, and secure 24/7 operation.

## Technologies Used

- **Frontend:** React
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express
- **Cloud Services:** AWS (Amazon Web Services)


## Demo Video
[Watch the Demo Video on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/tushar-gupta-5666ba23b_react-nodejs-express-activity-7219200218557239297-YeTo?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop)
`

## Installation
1. **Clone this repository.**
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/tushar21014/EmailSchedulerApp.git
        cd EmailSchedulerApp
2. **Update the .env file with your database credentials and AWS configurations.**

        ``` bash
        DB_HOST=localhost
        DB_USER=root
        DB_PASS=yourpassword
        DB_NAME=emailschedulerdb
        AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=yourAccessKeyId
        AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=yourSecretAccessKey
        AWS_REGION=yourRegion

3. **Install dependencies and build the project:**
        ```bash
        npm install
4. **Run the application:**
        ``` bash
        npm start
5. **Access the application:**
    The application will run on http://localhost:3000.
## Usage
1. **Register**: Send a POST request to /api/users/signup with user data in the request body.

2. **Login**: Send a POST request to /api/users/login with valid credentials. You will receive a JWT token upon successful login.

3. **Schedule an Email**: Send a POST request to /api/emails/schedule with email details and the scheduled time.

4. **Manage Scheduled Emails**:

- **View Emails**: Send a GET request to /api/emails to retrieve scheduled emails.
- **Edit Email**: Send a PUT request to /api/emails/:emailId to update the email details.
- **Delete Email**: Send a DELETE request to /api/emails/:emailId to remove the scheduled email.


## Contributing
Contributions are welcome! If you find any issues or have ideas for improvements, feel free to open a pull request :)

# About Me: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and Backend Developer skilled in designing and developing scalable web applications. Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, and various JavaScript frameworks. I am looking for a Backend Developer position where I can leverage my expertise to contribute to innovative software solutions.
## Socials: [![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-%230077B5.svg?logo=linkedin&logoColor=white)](https://linkedin.com/in/tushar-gupta-5666ba23b) ### Programming Languages title: iNotebook
description: Welcome to iNotebook, where note-taking transforms into a dynamic, innovative journey. Say goodbye to the limitations of traditional methods and embrace a new era of creativity and productivity.

body.raw:
iNotebook is a feature-rich online note-taking application that empowers users to create, edit, and access their notes conveniently using their account credentials. This project is built using the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack, ensuring a seamless and secure note-taking experience.

## Unshackling the Notebook

Have you ever experienced the frustration of deciphering cramped handwriting or losing crucial information within a sea of pages? The struggle ends here. iNotebook was born out of a vision to liberate you from the challenges of conventional note-taking. 

Imagine bidding farewell to:

Cluttered notebooks and cramped handwriting.
The ordeal of lost pages and critical information.
The relentless search for that one elusive piece of data.

## Seamless Creativity at Your Fingertips

iNotebook isn't just a platform; it's a canvas where your ideas evolve into masterpieces. With iNotebook, you can:

**Create:** Give life to your thoughts with ease. Craft notes that mirror the depth of your insights.
**Edit:** Refine your notes like a sculptor perfecting a masterpiece. Every modification brings you closer to brilliance.
**Delete:** Embrace the power of renewal. Clear the slate for fresh perspectives and new horizons.
**Tags:** Add tags to your notes to keep them organized and beautiful

## Embrace the Spark of Creation

In a world where innovation thrives, don't let mundane tasks stifle your creativity. iNotebook empowers you to transform sparks of imagination into dazzling brilliance. Each note you craft is a testament to your creative journey, and iNotebook is your steadfast partner in this remarkable expedition.

## Join the Revolution: Elevate Your Learning

Note-taking isn't a mere chore; it's a gateway to inspiration and innovation. It's about nurturing a future where learning knows no boundaries. Embark on a transformative journey with us, where excellence isn't just an outcome; it's a way of life.

## Unleash Your Ideas, Shape Your Destiny

Education isn't confined to textbooks; it's a living, breathing part of you. iNotebook empowers you to unleash the power of your ideas. Dive into a world where learning is an immersive experience, innovation thrives, and you hold the reins of your academic narrative. Welcome to a future where education isn't just learned; it's embraced and lived.


## Screenshots

### Home
![Home](https://github.com/Rahul-Sahani04/NoteSync/blob/main/project%20images/NoteSync-Home.png?raw=true)

### About
![About](https://github.com/Rahul-Sahani04/NoteSync/blob/main/project%20images/NoteSync-About.png?raw=true)

### Register
![Register](https://github.com/Rahul-Sahani04/NoteSync/blob/main/project%20images/NoteSync-Register.png?raw=true)

### Login
